title: Chow rings of quasi-split geometrically almost simple algebraic groups
abstract:
We compute the Chow ring of a quasi-split geometrically almost simple
algebraic group assuming the coefficients to be a field. This extends the
classical computation for split groups done by Kac to the non-split quasi-split
case. For the proof we introduce and study equivariant conormed Chow rings,
which are well adapted to the study of quasi-split groups and their homogeneous
varieties.
